title:
$L_p$-estimates for parabolic equations in divergence form with a
  half-time derivative
abstract:
We establish the unique solvability of solutions in Sobolev spaces to linear
parabolic equations in a more general form than those in the literature. A
distinguishing feature of our equations is the inclusion of a half-order time
derivative term on their right-hand side. We anticipate that such equations
will prove useful in various problems involving time evolution terms. Notably,
the coefficients of the equations exhibit significant irregularity, being
merely measurable with respect to the temporal variable or one spatial
variable.
